product_name: Royal Robbins Fuse Shorts - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The stretchy Royal Robbins Fuse Shorts are an exceptional choice for travel adventures that take you to foreign cities and onto hiking trails through forests. Rugged, trail-worthy blend of nylon and spandex feels like cotton, but will stand up to regular wear while traveling and trekking; fabric resists wrinkles and dries quickly. UPF 50+ sun protection. Hand pockets; rear pockets with rip-and-stick closures; zippered thigh pocket; drop-in cell phone pocket; breathable mesh pocket bags to allow airflow. Inseam gusset allows unrestricted range of motion. The Royal Robbins Fuse Shorts have a regular fit with a 12 in. inseam. Closeout.
short_description: The stretchy Royal Robbins Fuse Shorts are an exceptional choice for travel adventures that take you to foreign cities and onto hiking trails through forests.
